title: CAYENNE Hair Growth & Hair Loss Treatment & Scalp Care Hair Oil (EFFECTIVE SOLUTION FOR THINNING HAIR) 3.4 oz/ 100 ml
description: CAYENNE Hair Growth scalp treatment was created on the anatomy and physiology of human hair. Its unique formula reduces hair loss by promoting additional blood circulation around hair follicles, and restores lost proteins that increase hair follicle strength.CAYENNE Hair Growth is rich in fatty acids, omega-3 oils and vitamins to improve scalp health, which encourages hair follicles to remain in their growth phase to stimulate hair regrowth.CAYENNE Hair Growth must be used exclusively on scalp area. Avoid contact with eyes.Check other hair regrowth products in our store: CAYENNE Hair Growth Shampoo and extra strong scalp treatment SAW PALMETTO CAYENNE Hair GrowthPlease Note: To see new hair growth it will take at least 6 to 10 weeks of treatment. That's because healthy hair follicles that are not producing hair, need to rest 2 to 4 months before cells start dividing again and new hairs begin to grow. When using a natural botanical products it's important to have realistic expectations that new baby hair growth will take time.  Remember that it is physically impossible for new hair growth to occur in just a few days. In case of treating male hair loss make sure that hair loss was not the cause of dihydrotestosterone (DHT). Our CAYENNE Hair Growth treatments are designed to stimulate existing hair follicles that are healthy enough to produce hair, and it will only work on follicles that can produce hair. This product is made from all natural ingredients and is not medicine. See your doctor for medical treatments.If you have any questions regarding our products or need any advice on hair care treatment routines, please don't hesitate to contact us over the phone 949-706-1997 or here on Amazon.We are always here to help you to achieve the best hair possible!
